note.p: Printer and stationer. Son of Edmund Robson Dorrell, senior compositor at William Clowes and Sons, printers. Ran a printing business and shop at 15 Charing Cross, London.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1057/1/32/9), 1851 (HO107/1570/34/8), 1861 (RG9/56/131/4), 1871 (RG10/359/5/3), 1881 (RG11/659/57/8)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 20 May 2020)
London, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1917 (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 May 2020)
